original_title: Rosamunde Pilcher: Das Haus an der Küste
overview: Nicholas Breen had a car accident while preparing to move from London to Cornwall. Veronica, Nicholas's wife, nevertheless moves to Cornwall with her two children in the house left by Aunt Cleo. There she meets her childhood sweetheart Frank again.
title: Rosamunde Pilcher: Das Haus an der Küste
